newsitem.title: USA: Sport-Haley says shareholder boosts stake.
newsitem.headline: Sport-Haley says shareholder boosts stake.

text.p: Sport-Haley Inc said Wednesday that one of its shareholders -- the Minneapolis-based money management firm Woodland Partners -- now owns 7.3 percent of its common shares.

The company said Woodland Partners filed a Form 13G with the Securities and Exchange Commission, indicating that its ownership of Sport-Haley's stock exceeded five percent after its recent purchase of 315,000 shares.
Officials at Sport-Haley were not immediately available to comment.
A Woodland Partners official said the company was "simply boosting its investment stake" in Sport-Haley, which makes men's and women's golf apparel.
